name: Tiny Candy Guardian 御菓子島の魔法使い
name_original: Tiny Candy Guardian 御菓子島の魔法使い
description:
☆An easy-to-play VR game.

★Players do not need to move, use the left and right hand respective magic weapons to meet the enemies coming from everywhere.

☆Use randomly dropped items during the battle to constantly strengthen and replace your weapons.

★Shake your body to avoid enemy bullets.

☆Have the final battle with the huge boss.
